scripts.pantograph.bundle: pnpm pantograph.build && cp -r packages/pantograph/dist/Lib packages/pantograph/dist/Tutorial public/ && cp packages/pantograph/dist/main.css public/pantograph.css && cp packages/pantograph/dist/index.js public/pantograph.js
scripts.fp-in-monaco.bundle: pnpm fp-in-monaco.build && rm -rf public/_next && cp -r packages/fp-in-monaco/out/_next public/_next && cp packages/fp-in-monaco/out/index.html public/fp-in-monaco.html
scripts.bundle: pnpm run pantograph.bundle && pnpm run fp-in-monaco.bundle
scripts.serve: pnpm run bundle && pnpm run dev
scripts.serve-3: pnpm run build && pnpm run pantograph.serve & pnpm run fp-in-monaco.serve & pnpm run dev
